main_conferences: FASE: Fundamental Approaches to Software Engineering
FoSSaCS: Foundations of Software Science and Computation Structures
TACAS: Tools and Algorithms for the Construction and Analysis of Systems

call_for_satellite_events.invitation: The ETAPS 2026 organizing committee invites proposals for satellite events to complement the main conferences.
call_for_satellite_events.purpose: Satellite events provide an opportunity to discuss and report on emerging research approaches and practical experiences relevant to the theory and practice of software.

organizer_responsibilities: create and maintain a website for the event
form a Program Committee and produce a call for papers (if appropriate)
advertise the event to complement ETAPS publicity
review submissions and make acceptance decisions
prepare the event's program according to ETAPS 2026 schedule
organize formal publication of proceedings (if desired)
committee_responsibilities: promote the event on ETAPS website and materials
provide a meeting room, A/V equipment, coffee breaks, and possibly lunches

submission_guidelines.submission_method: Submit proposals to the Satellite Events Chairs using the online application form.
information_requested: name and acronym of the satellite event
names and contact information of the organizers
duration of the event and preferred period
brief description of the event topic
explanation of the event topic's relevance to ETAPS
publicity strategy and selection procedure for contributions
tentative schedule for paper submission and proceedings
